inclusion.criterion: Fasting plasma glucose between 200-300 mg/dl (A1C level between 7% and 10%).
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Those who age between 30 and 80 years old and can inject insulin by themselves.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Impaired renal function (Serum creatinine >1.5 mg/dL in male, >1.4 mg/dL in female )
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Recently suffered from MI or CVA.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has type 1 diabetes, not type 2. He is being treated with ACE inhibitors and Beta blockers for cardiomyopathy.
